title: Kasa No Shita, Futari
alternative_title: 傘の下、ふたり ; 雨傘下、兩個人 ; Under the Umbrella, With You ; Under the Umbrella, Together ; Two People, Under the Umbrella
status: 傘の下、ふたり ; 雨傘下、兩個人 ; Under the Umbrella, With You ; Under the Umbrella, Together ; Two People, Under the Umbrella
description:
Description :
        Mio Keisuke is a high-schooler who leads a rather dull, boring life. He can’t keep a girlfriend—because being a kept man is too much of a hassle, and he can’t bring himself to fall in love and want to please his woman. Then—one day he seeks shelter from a sudden downpour under the awning of an apartment owned by Yugi Kakeru… and suddenly his life isn’t so dull anymore as he finds himself falling for his aloof and yet obviously lonely friend.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 5.6 : When You Wish Upon A Star
Vol.1 Chapter 5.5 : Together With You Forever
